question: Which country was the location of the event "2015 Liza Oilfield Discovery"?
explanation: Guyana was the location of the event "2015 Liza Oilfield Discovery". In May 2015 ExxonMobil announced the discovery of more than 90 metres of high-quality, oil-bearing sandstone reservoirs about 200 km off the coastline, considered to be one of the largest crude oil discovery of the past decade. Subsequent discoveries were made in early 2018 at sites Payara, Liza Deep, Snoek, Turbot, Ranger and Pacora.
